problem.markdown:
>>Spodosols commonly have a large horizon of decomposing organic material called the: << (x) O horizon () A horizon () E horizon () B horizon () C horizon
[explanation] The O horizon is the horizon made from decomposing organic material. O horizons are often particularly thick in spodosols. [explanation]
problem.p: Spodosols commonly have a large horizon of decomposing organic material called the:

choicegroup.label: Spodosols commonly have a large horizon of decomposing organic material called the:

div.p: The O horizon is the horizon made from decomposing organic material. O horizons are often particularly thick in spodosols.
